document.full_text: new england is bracing for a spring storm that could bring up to a foot of snow on april fool's day on friday, and meteorologists are saying the forecast is no joke.
document.title: new england braces for spring storm that may bring heavy snow
lines_and_colors: new england is bracing for a spring storm that could bring up to a foot of snow on april fool's day on friday, and meteorologists are saying the forecast is no joke.
